text: Russell Brand's Ponderland is a British comedy television programme. It is presented by Russell Brand and was first shown on Channel 4 in 2007 and 2008. Brand talks about a different topic in each episode, showing clips of archive footage and commenting on them. == Other websites == * Category:2007 British television series debuts Category:2008 television series endings Category:2000s British comedy television series Category:Channel 4 comedy
title: Russell Brand's Ponderland
